title: Spectraformer: deep learning model for grain spectral qualitative analysis based on transformer structure
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8053-8066
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA07708J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zhuo Chen, Rigui Zhou, Pengju Ren
This study used portable near-infrared spectroscopy and various preprocessing techniques to explore universal methods. The spectraformer model showed superior performance among the compared machine learning models.
